org.zowe.sdk.zos.security.service

Interface PlatformSecurityService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyPlatformSecurityService, ZosJniPlatformSecurityService

    public interface PlatformSecurityService
    Provides low-level security function that are z/OS platform dependent. Known implementations: DummyPlatformSecurityService, ZosJniPlatformSecurityService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createThreadSecurityContext(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String applId)
      Create a thread-level security context (ACEE).
      void createThreadSecurityContextByDaemon(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String applId)
      Create a thread-level security context (ACEE) without password using the daemon authority.
      java.lang.String getCurrentThreadUserId() 
      void removeThreadSecurityContext()
      Remove the current thread-level security context (ACEE).

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentThreadUserId

        java.lang.String getCurrentThreadUserId()
        Returns:
        The current user ID of the security context of the current thread.

      • createThreadSecurityContext

        void createThreadSecurityContext(java.lang.String userId,
                                 java.lang.String password,
                                 java.lang.String applId)
        Create a thread-level security context (ACEE). ApplID can be null if you want to use the default one (OMVSAPPL).

      • createThreadSecurityContextByDaemon

        void createThreadSecurityContextByDaemon(java.lang.String userId,
                                         java.lang.String applId)
        Create a thread-level security context (ACEE) without password using the daemon authority.

      • removeThreadSecurityContext

        void removeThreadSecurityContext()
        Remove the current thread-level security context (ACEE).
